pullRequest.title: Refactor/contributor content
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR description
Contributor files and docs refactoring.
Repo's Contributor files have been refactored, split up and/or removed and sent to the wiki (
https://wiki.hyperledger.org/display/BESU/Content+Refactor).

simplified CONTRIBUTING.md
removed unnecessary root MD's
Removed unused files from docs/images
edited README.md
moved many docs to split pages in wiki

Fixed Issue(s)
PIE-1991
(Partially, because issue also includes besu-docs refactor)

commit.message:
Contributor Content: complete refactor

- Deleted contributor files now hosted in wiki,
(CLI-STYLE-GUIDE.md, CODE-OF-CONDUCT.md, CODING-CONVENTIONS.md,
ROADMAP.md, SECURITY.md).
- Deleted old docs files in /docs folder (except readme for redirect).
- Refactored the root README.md with relevant content.
- Refactored the CONTRIBUTING.md file to simplify it with links to wiki.

Signed-off-by: Felipe Faraggi <felipefaraggi@gmail.com>

added contact developer advocate link

Signed-off-by: Felipe Faraggi <felipefaraggi@gmail.com>

small updates on README and CONTRIBUTING MDs.

Signed-off-by: Felipe Faraggi <felipefaraggi@gmail.com>
